# Testing Observable.js with R and Quarto


```{r, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)

data <- cars

ojs_define(observable_data = data)
```

```{ojs}
Plot.plot({
  marks: [
    Plot.dot(transpose(observable_data), 
      {x: "speed", y: "dist"}, 
      { stroke: "black" }
    )
  ]}
)
```
